channel.title: CVE Feed for Trustmary -- Review & testimonial widgets
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trustmary -- Review & testimonial widgets

item.title: CVE-2024-44022|2024-10-07T13:07:19.357Z -- trustmary -- review%20%26%20testimonial%20widgets
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Trustmary Review & testimonial widgets allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Review & testimonial widgets: from n/a through 1.0.5.
